body.name: Queen Bed Frame Metal Platform Bed Frame Queen Size 14 Inch Mattress Foundation Box Spring Replacement Heavy Duty Steel Slat Noise-Free Easy Assembly,Black
deliveryMessages: $19.99 delivery February 21 - 22. Order within 3 hrs 16 mins.
features: ●CONTEMPORARY DESIGN - Our queen sized metal bed frame simplifies and streamlines your bedroom. Replacing both the box spring and standard bed frame, our bed frame comes with 12 legs, providing a solid foundation for even the heaviest, densest mattresses.

●HUMANITY IN DESIGN - Every detail of this bed frame is designed with your needs in mind, from the convenient assembly to the anti-skid foot pads, so all you have to worry about is getting a good nights’ sleep.

●BUILT TO LAST - Our premium metal bed frame is made of the highest quality materials, with powder coated metal that is sturdy and durable, with a capacity of up to 350 lbs. Additionally, at 14” tall, this platform bed frame provides 12.5” of ample under-bed storage.

●EASY ASSEMBLY - The bed frame can be easily assembled and disassembled quickly and easily. It comes in a compact package that can easily fit through narrow doorways, hallways and stairwells. Disassemble the bed for quick storage in the narrowest of spaces

●LAST LONG USEING: Material-Platform Bed Frame,Our premium metal bed frame made of selected eco-friendly materials, which is exquisite workmanship,Powder Coated Metal Mattress Foundation Frame.Bed Frame Heavy-Duty Steel Slat Platform Bed Frame Metal Mattress Foundation Frame Full Size Folding Bed Frame

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Packs Away Perfectly
reviews.reviewText: My parents were sleeping on an air mattress every when came to visit me. My dad struggled to get up and down from it, plus, it was a little chilly to sleep on. This frame is PERFECT for visitors! It sets up well in the "spare" room and then packs away perfectly to fit under a regular bed frame. It's sturdy and a good height when set up. We got a tri-fold mattress to go with it that goes in a protective bag and up in the attic when not being used. I've been very happy with this purchase and my parents were pleasantly surprised and happy with their first use with it too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for guests
reviews.reviewText: I used this for a guest over Christmas. It was easy to set up and take down for storing. I used a twin size air mattress on it but did put an extra sheet between the frame and mattress just in case there might have been any sharp spots. I put it in my craft room and there is enough space under it for me to store items that would normally be laying out. It is nice and sturdy. It will be great to have for guests.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to assemble and functional
reviews.reviewText: This frame is very easy to put together and it is very functional. In my opinion, it wouldn't be sturdy enough for a daily bed frame. But we use it for guests and it works great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Super sturdy and easy to put together. Nothing fancy, but for the price, you really can’t beat it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Affordable, easily assembled, and not noisy. One of the supports didn’t quite line up to the bolt though but it doesn’t seem to be a problem. Would buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My son is a big boy so we upgraded his bed. We highly recommend this frame. It's easy to assemble and very sturdy! Also weight wise? Yeaaa it's durable and can definitely hold weight.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect base for Innerspring mattress
reviews.reviewText: Easy to assemble, lightweight enough to maneuver yet sturdy. We have wood floors so metal frame was a concern initially but no problems with scratching the floor. Once the mattress is on the frame it stays in place. It was purchased for daughter's room and works with headboard and footboard if you like but you'll need hardware to affix those.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars good for price
reviews.reviewText: as a heavier set it squeaks quite often but besides that it’s sturdy and great for price

reviews.reviewTitle: Good Quality for a Good Price
reviews.reviewText: I received this product in the mail yesterday. Setting it up was relatively easy, except for the fact that the hardware didn’t line up properly in one spot. The bed frame makes a bit of noise - but that could be because of the hardware issue I encountered. There is tons of space underneath the bed frame for storage which I will be using. The shipping price for this item is ridiculous, but in the end it’s worth it. Overall, a good quality product for a good price.

This product is of low quality and absolutely not as described at Amazon. It is wiggly, and the leg support is not strong enough to hold it straight; it bent after two months, and the bed is useless now. Big waste of time and money.

This bed is affordable sturdy, serves my needs adequately. However, assembling it was a bit of a pain because a couple of screws didn't fit into their holds as smoothly as they were supposed to and required a bit of hammering in.

reviews.reviewTitle: the frame is approx. 1.5" narrower than the standard twin/single mattress. not happy
reviews.reviewText: the frame is approx. 1.5" narrower than the standard twin/single mattress. not happy

reviews.reviewerName: Useless product. It shakes too much, I can already see some part of the bed has bend after the use of 3 days. Not returning because of the 45 cad I paid for delivery.
reviews.reviewText: This product is not for long term. It’s extremely dangerous as I can already see some part of the bed has bend only after use of 3 days. Not returning because can’t afford the 45 CAD that I paid for delivery. Really disappointing.
